import React from 'react'; import { Container, Card, Row, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Profile = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); if (!user) { return (

Loading profile...

 ); } return ( User Profile Username {user.sub} Email {user.email} First Name {user.firstName} Last Name {user.lastName} Role {user.role} ); }; export default Profile;
